game.name: SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 다크 히어로 '섀도우'가 종횡무진 질주하는 완전 신작 『섀도우 제너레이션즈』 신규 요소가 추가되어 다양한 스테이지의 스피드런을 즐길 수 있는 『소닉 제너레이션즈』 두 타이틀이 세트로 구성된 『소닉×섀도우 제너레이션즈』로 하이 스피드 액션 어드벤처를 마음껏 즐기자!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shadow the Hedgehog is back with Classic and Modern Sonic in SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS, an all-new collection featuring two unique experiences!

reviewHighlights.text: I have completed both Sonic & Shadow Generations with all achievements and despite my love towards main core or both games I have mixed feelings after...
It's my first time playing Sonic generations. I enjoyed it quite a bit. I loved finding the chao in the stages. The Shadow content was absolutely fire...
